data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. Leverkusen have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 7, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Tobias Stieler awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Goal! Leverkusen have got their heads in front thanks to a Mitchell Weiser strike.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Goal! Leverkusen extend their lead to 0-2 through Moussa Diaby.
In the minute 11, Tobias Stieler awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for 1. FC Cologne, close to Leverkusen's area.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 20, Leverkusen drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In Cologne Leverkusen attack through Leon Bailey. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Leverkusen push upfield but Tobias Stieler quickly pulls them for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 28, Leverkusen's Nadiem Amiri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
In the minute 31, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 34, Jannes Horn for 1. FC Cologne has been booked by Tobias Stieler and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
The home team replace Jannes Horn with Dimitris Limnios.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Goal kick for Leverkusen at RheinEnergieStadion.
Tobias Stieler will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Tobias Stieler signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
The first-half is over at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Leverkusen at RheinEnergieStadion.
Kingsley Ehizibue is replacing Jan Thielmann for the home team.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 49, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 52, 1. FC Cologne advance rapidly upfield but Tobias Stieler blows for offside.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 54, Aleksandar Dragovic (Leverkusen) has received a yellow card from Tobias Stieler.
Goal! Leverkusen extend their lead to 0-3 through Patrik Schick.
Great play from Moussa Diaby to set up the goal.
In the minute 56, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Free kick Leverkusen.
Goal! Florian Wirtz extends Leverkusen's lead to 0-4.
In the minute 58, That's a fine assist from Leon Bailey.
Tobias Stieler signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 61, 1. FC Cologne are pushing forward but Ellyes Skhiri's finish is wide of the goal.
Tobias Stieler awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
1. FC Cologne make their third substitution with Anthony Modeste replacing Sebastian Andersson.
In the minute 65, Jonas Hector is on a sub for Ellyes Skhiri for 1. FC Cologne.
The home team replace Elvis Rexhbecaj with Jorge Mere.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
In the minute 67, Leverkusen make their first substitution with Kerem Demirbay replacing Julian Baumgartlinger.
Karim Bellarabi is on a sub for Leon Bailey for Leverkusen.
Edmond Tapsoba is replacing Aleksandar Dragovic for the away team.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Leverkusen at RheinEnergieStadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 76, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 78, Leverkusen make their fourth substitution with Lucas Alario replacing Patrik Schick.
The away team have replaced Nadiem Amiri with Daley Sinkgraven. This is the fifth substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
At RheinEnergieStadion, 1. FC Cologne are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 79, Leverkusen are caught offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 85, Leverkusen to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 86, 1. FC Cologne's Ismail Jakobs misses with an attempt on goal.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-4.
